description:
Browse and shop for lululemon gear from anywhere! Be ready for all your sweaty pursuits with technical athletic clothing and accessories for running, cross-training, and yoga.  

Get the gear:
 
• Shop instantly. Our app is built from the ground up to feel as snappy as your personal bests. 
• You’ll find high-quality photos of products taken from every angle and a zoom-in feature that lets you nerd out hard on every technical detail. 
• Inventory-check your local store and find out right from your phone if your size and colour are in stock. 
• Favourites: So many products to love, so little time! Add products to your Favourites list so you can easily come back to them later.
• eGift Cards: Buy electronic gift cards for your family and friends through the app and send them directly to their email. 
• Store Locator: Find store hours and locations right on your phone. 
• Pay with ApplePay

 
Connect with the community:

• Join our global yoga ambassadors for 20, 45 or 60-minute yoga classes
• Get inspired by real and authentic stories posted by our own ambassadors and stores.
• Curious about what goes into our gear? Get an insider look through exclusive behind-the-scenes videos.
 
Manage your account:
 
• Use Touch ID or Face ID to make sign-in easy; rest assured, your biometric data is protected and safe. 
• My Account: Update your profile and subscribe to product emails in the improved Account settings.
• Store your preferences and purchase information to make checkout a breeze. And of course, standard shipping is always complimentary. 
 
Founded in Vancouver British Columbia in 1998, the first lululemon athletica store shared space with a yoga studio. We’ve grown quite a bit since then and our technical athletic apparel for men and women is now available online, in stores, and in showrooms all over the world. 
 
Have an idea, problem, or feedback? Get in touch at gec@lululemon.com

Shop brands you love:

- Shop big brands and local stores, and follow your faves
- Get notified about special offers, price drops, restocks, and new product drops
- Save items for later and organize things into collections (like “camping gear” or “ideas for dad”)
- Just so you know: brands don’t pay extra to sell on Shop, which means each time you buy, you’re helping out the business

Check out with one tap:

- Your payment info, shipping address, and shopping preferences all live in your secure Shop Pay wallet
- Just tap to check out (no more getting up to go find your card)
- Every shopping cart from every store is saved on Shop, so it’s all there when you’re ready to check out
- Just so you know: your info is safe with Shop, which meets strict PCI compliance standards

Track all your orders:

- See every order from every store you buy from
- Map exactly where each package is now
- Shop can even scan your email for new order info and collect it for you in the app (no more searching your inbox for updates) 

- - -

Have a question or just want to say hello? Contact us by visiting help.shop.app

Shop secure and worry free: Our servers meet strict PCI compliance standards for vaulting credit card info.

Powered by Shopify: Shop was created by the commerce platform trusted by millions of businesses worldwide.

Your personal Stylist— whenever, wherever. Explore app-exclusive content and curated outfit ideas. Unlock exclusive early access to coveted collabs, drops and new product launches. Discover the Closet feature, a living archive of all your Aritzia pieces — and get inspired by our best-dressed community of Aritzia Muses, in-house Stylists and content creators. Plus, the app’s immersive design, intuitive browsing and elevated Product Pages ensure a seamless shopping experience. Clothes are fun — and this app knows it.

Key Features:
App-Exclusive Content
Explore the Style Feed, a shoppable stream of styling inspiration. Discover the latest trends, access expert advice from our very own Stylists, get an insider look at Aritzia’s newest collections and more.

App-Exclusive Early Access
Be the first to know — and shop — with early access to our most coveted collaborations, colour drops and new product launches.

Closet
Another app-exclusive feature that keeps track of your Aritzia pieces, purchased in-app, in-store and online. See what you have and how to style it, all in one sleek space.

Immersive Design for Endless Discovery
So immersive, it’ll feel like you’re at our boutiques. Elevated Product Pages feature Gallery Mode visuals and even audio. Intuitive browsing and endless recommendations help you discover your next favourite style — and 15 after that.

We use cookies and similar technologies that collect information about your device and track your online activity on our app, our website, and other online services. While the current version of the Aritzia app gives you the right to decide whether or not to permit the use of data used to track you, it does not offer the ability to fully disable cookies.  Even if you do not allow the use of tracking data, Aritzia may use some of your personal information in the app, including to make the app content more relevant to you, which you cannot disable within the app.  By downloading and using this app, you consent to our use of cookies.  Our Privacy Policy explains how you can opt out of certain cookies based on their purpose (including targeted advertising) when you use our website.

Sign up by creating an account or log in with your existing SKIMS account to unlock SKIMS Rewards today! SKIMS is a solutions-oriented brand creating the next generation of underwear, loungewear, and shapewear. We are setting new standards by providing solutions for every body. From technically constructed shapewear that enhances your curves to underwear that stretches to twice its size, our goal is to consistently innovate on the past and advance our industry for the future.

Amazon Shopping offers app-only benefits to help make shopping on Amazon faster and easier. Browse, view product details, read reviews, and purchase millions of products. Amazon delivers to 100+ countries in as quickly as 3-5 days. Whether you’re buying gifts, reading reviews, tracking orders, scanning products, or just shopping, the Amazon Shopping app offers more benefits than shopping on Amazon via your desktop.

Never miss a delivery
Get real-time tracking and delivery notifications so you know where your package is and when it arrives.

Know exactly what you’re purchasing
Full 360° product view lets you see items from every angle. “View in you room” makes sure it fits by using your phone’s camera and VR so you can see it in your space.

We’ll notify you when items go on sale
Just tap the heart icon to save items to Your Lists and we’ll alert you of price drops so you don’t miss a deal.

Never forget your password
Save time by staying securely signed in. If you prefer to sign out, use facial or fingerprint identification to sign back in.

Connect with us when it works best for you
Live chat support is open 24 hours, 7 days a week. Once you’ve started a chat, it stays that way for 24 hours so you don’t have to start your support session from the beginning.

We’ll find that item for you
Not sure of an item’s brand or where to but it? Just tap the scan icon in the search bar, take a picture of the item or its barcode, and we’ll find it for you.

In order to provide a rich experience and enable features such as voice shopping, notifications, visual search, customer reviews, and authentication this app may request permission to access contacts, camera, microphone, notification, touch id, photos and Bluetooth.

Amazon Shopping is available in English and French. In addition to International Shopping, you can change your settings in this single app to shop Amazon.co.uk, Amazon.de, Amazon.fr, Amazon.com, Amazon.it, Amazon.es, Amazon.cn, Amazon.co.jp or Amazon.in.

For customers located within the European Union, United Kingdom or Brazil: By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use applicable for your country. Please also see the applicable Privacy Notice, Cookies Notice and Interest-Based Ads Notice for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

For all other customers: By using this app, you agree to the applicable Amazon Conditions of Use (e.g. www.amazon.ca/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (e.g. www.amazon.ca/privacy) for your country. Links to these terms and notices can be found in the footer of your local Amazon homepage.

If your device supports TrueDepth technology, the app will use your device camera to detect your facial movements only while using certain features such as virtually try-on products like sunglasses. All information processed using this technology remains on your device and is not otherwise stored, processed or shared by Amazon.

Discover effortless shopping and effortless style — all with the UNIQLO app. Explore the latest men’s, women’s and kids’ clothing collaborations, inspire your style with fresh fashion ideas, and claim exclusive app-only deals. From timeless LifeWear and streetwear favorites to winter HEATTECH thermal layers and breathable AIRism lines for warmer days, be the first to know when the clothing you love most is back in stock. 

Complete your wardrobe with everyday denim jeans and essential accessories for your home and redefine your fashion shopping experience with the app that brings you the best of UNIQLO. Discover a clothing app for men, women and kids. 

Inspire your clothes shopping 
Browse styles shared by customers, influencers, and UNIQLO staff members from all over the world and get inspiration for your next outfit. 
Find ideas for women’s, men’s and kids’ clothing and shop practical, stylish collections for all ages and seasons. 
Discover online-exclusive sizes and clothing styles you won’t find anywhere else. 

Kids’ and baby clothes shopping 
Discover stylish and comfortable clothing for the little ones. 
From playful and durable everyday kids’ clothing like jeans, t-shirts, and shorts, to soft and gentle fabrics perfect for newborns, UNIQLO has just what you need for your kids’ wardrobes. 
Shop seasonal kids’ clothing collections, featuring streetwear-inspired designs and limited-edition collaborations, all exclusive to UNIQLO. 

Save your favourite clothing styles 
Tag clothes you like as “Favourites” and keep a collection of looks you love. 
Get notified when items you’ve tagged as favourites are available for pickup, back in stock, or on sale. 
Keep adding your favourite clothes to your collection for more personalized style and shopping recommendations. 

Clothes-sizing videos 
See styles up close with product videos that give you a detailed look at the cut and fabric, giving you a more realistic idea of how clothing fits. 

MySize ASSIST 
Take the guesswork out of fashion shopping with MySize Assistant. 
Simply enter your body measurements and preferred fit, and we’ll recommend a clothing size that’s perfect for you. 

Back-in-stock notifications 
Get alerts sent straight to your phone and be the first to know when the clothing style you’ve been eyeing is back in stock. 

UNIQLO product scanner 
Use the app to scan product barcodes at home or in store and easily check if nearby stores have your perfect clothing size and fit. 

App-exclusive offers 
Download UNIQLO and unlock $10 off your first purchase of $75 or more—new customers only. 
Scan your app member ID at checkout to unlock exclusive, member-only discounts. 

Save time—and the planet—with e-receipts 
Opt for e-receipts at checkout to easily track your clothes shopping history right from the app. 
Return or exchange clothing and other items using electronic receipts, saving you the hassle of keeping track of paper receipts. 

Have your say 
Share feedback on items you’ve bought with the UNIQLO team and keep a lookout for product improvements. 
Read reviews from customers who have bought the same products as you. See the star rating, gender, height, weight and age of the customer who posted the review to help you choose the perfect product. 

UNIQLO customer care 
Chat with a UNIQLO representative for assistance with all your clothes and shopping needs.

Everything you love, now at your fingertips!

SHEIN is a fun and ultra-affordable online shopping platform. Discovering rich items, trying new things and sharing with others,  SHEIN is dedicated to meet all your needs in life and works as your one-stop shopping destination! We'll keep you in the loop with push notifications about new drops and more. You can also engage with other SHEIN lovers and in real time! 

Inspire yourself with SHEIN right now! 

Save you more
- Get an extra 15% off on your first order 
- Free shipping （*conditions apply)
- Free returns （*conditions apply）
- Daily flash sales on many items

Wide selections 
- Fun, easy shopping with wide selections
- Browse by New Arrivals, Trends, Category, Best Sellers and more

Considerate services
- Get first access to sale alerts and promotional discounts
- Now accepting PayPal and major Credit Cards 
- Style now, pay later! Choose Afterpay to pay in 4 interest-free payments.
- Customer Service and Live Chat available

Contact us:
URL: ca.shein.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sheincanada
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/shein_ca/
Email: dispute@shein.com

Download Walmart Canada’s online shopping and grocery delivery app. Save time and money by shopping for weekly groceries, household essentials, and more—right from your phone or tablet. Discover thousands of items at the same everyday low prices as in store, including groceries, appliances, clothing, toys, furniture, electronics, and more. Choose convenient in-store pickup at your nearest Walmart store or home delivery and have your order delivered right to your door. Say “goodbye” to long commutes and lineups and “hello” to effortless online shopping with Walmart Canada’s user-friendly app. 

Here are more reasons why you will love the Walmart Canada’s online shopping and grocery app:  

Discover groceries & more on our one-stop online shopping app 

Shop all Walmart Canada’s aisles from one convenient app, from fresh and frozen groceries to general merchandise, and more. 

 

Shop your local Walmart store & weekly flyer deals 

Select your preferred Walmart store to see accurate pricing and product availability. Get instant access to your weekly flyer deals to save on groceries and more. 

 

See shipping options while browsing 

Find out whether an item is eligible for pickup or delivery right in the product details. 

 

Choose Grocery Delivery or Grocery Pickup*  

When you’ve finished your grocery shopping, select a convenient time to pick up your order at your nearest Walmart store. Or, choose Grocery Delivery and have your groceries and other items delivered to your door. 

 

Make Grocery Pickup quick & easy with mobile check-in 

Check-in on the Walmart App prior to your Grocery Pickup timeslot, so that your order is ready upon arrival. 

 

Receive convenient order status updates 

Follow your order every step of the way right from the Walmart App. 

 

Enjoy promo codes  

Add promo codes at checkout without hassle. Use APP60 at checkout and get $15 off your first 4 online orders. $75 min. Conditions apply.  

 

Save even more time by creating lists & reordering past purchases 

After your first online grocery order, easily reorder your past purchases. As you browse the aisles, create a list of your favorite items to shop for and purchase later. 

 

Scan barcodes to reveal product details 

Use the Walmart App to scan product barcodes in-store or at-home to see pricing, availability, reviews, and more to help make shopping easier. 

 

Complete holiday & gift shopping with ease 

Order gifts, décor, food, and more for holidays and special occasions, with a wide selection of toys, electronics, appliances, clothing, groceries, and more under one app. 

 

Shop the Walmart Canada toy store from the comfort of home 

Find all the hottest toys on the Walmart App and skip the lineups and hassle of in-store shopping. 

 

Discover the latest electronics 

Find the latest electronics—including TVs, tablets, laptops, digital cameras, and more—along with the specs, reviews, pricing, shipping options, and other details you need to purchase with confidence. 

 

Save time and money; download the Walmart Canada online shopping and grocery app now! We value your feedback. If you have something to share, email us at cacstexper@walmart.com. 

 

*Must have a minimum order value of $35 (before taxes & fees) to be eligible for Grocery Delivery and Grocery Pickup. Grocery Delivery is available in select locations. Delivery fees apply. See our Help Centre for more information.

The Costco Mobile App is the easiest way to save time and money on the go. We've completely re-thought our mobile app and made it easier for members to access the incredible values found only at Costco.

DIGITAL MEMBERSHIP CARD: Access your membership card from the home page of the app. Use your membership card to enter the warehouse and at checkout.

SAVINGS: With the Costco Mobile App you'll always have the latest Warehouse Savings right on your device.

SHOP: Members can shop Costco.ca’s unique, expanded selection, offering thousands of items not found at your local warehouse, delivered straight to your door.

WAREHOUSE INFO: See details about your nearest Costco including hours of operation and holiday hours, and navigate straight to the warehouse.

SHOPPING LIST: Keep track of the items you want to pick up on your next trip to Costco.

PHOTOS: Order prints, wall décor or photo gifts anywhere, anytime.

SPECIAL EVENTS: View the Special Events happening at your local Costco and set reminders for upcoming events.

These are only a few of the new features of our mobile app - take it for a spin, we welcome your feedback as we continue to improve: webservice@contactcostco.ca

The rewards program unlike any other. With exclusive events and offers based on the items you buy most, the PC Optimum program is tailored specifically to you. And the more you use the program the better it gets – and the more free stuff you get. Load offers, earn and redeem points and manage your account all through the convenience of the PC Optimum app.

IMPORTANT DISCLOSURES AND CONSENT

In order to understand current and future consumer interests and to improve or develop new products, services, programs, promotions, contests or events, President’s Choice Services Inc. may track and analyze your use of the application, including offers viewed, opt-out preferences, click-throughs and other use of features. We may collect personal information and non-personal information electronically, directly from you or through third parties. For instance, we may access personal information about you when you share information about yourself on social media networks and also when you interact with us electronically such as through our information technology systems, websites, email, mobile applications, social media properties or online advertising.
If you choose to download or use this application (“app”), we may receive personal information and non-personal information about your current location and about your mobile device, tablet, or browser, such as a unique identifier for your device. Most devices, tablets and browsers allow you to turn off the tracking of your location. However, if you do so, you may not be able to use some of the app features.

PC Optimum Support https://www.pcoptimum.ca/help-and-support/faq

Black Friday starts here — score huge deals on the AliExpress app right now. AliExpress brings millions of items across fashion, electronics, home, beauty and more, all in one easy app so you can grab Black Friday discounts, flash sales and app-only coupons.

Find top brands, unique finds and everyday essentials at great prices. Read honest buyer reviews, compare sellers, and use smart search and filters to find exactly what you want. With AliExpress you get personalized recommendations, saved wishlists, price-drop alerts and curated collections tailored to your tastes.

We make shopping safe and simple. AliExpress protects your purchase with secure payments, buyer protection and easy returns. Track orders in real time, get delivery updates, and choose fast shipping options when you need items quickly. Chat with sellers or our support team right from the app.

Don’t miss limited-time Black Friday deals, exclusive app offers and flash events — AliExpress updates promotions constantly so you can save more. Whether you’re hunting for gifts, seasonal styles, or must-have gadgets, AliExpress puts endless choice and value in your pocket.

Download the AliExpress app today, join millions of shoppers, and enjoy worry-free shopping during Black Friday and all year round. Great finds and huge savings are just a tap away on AliExpress.

Discover an all-new take on the original Nespresso shopping experience to bring your go-to favorites and latest coffee creations closer to you than ever before.

Easier shopping

Browse. Choose. Order. Before you know it, your favorite coffee will be on its way, as simple as that.

Designed with you in mind

Discover a selection of products based on what you love to explore uncharted flavor territories. Experience the convenience of seamless reorders, ensuring that your favorite coffees are always within reach.

Follow your order

Stay in the loop with real-time updates so you know what’s happening with your order at every step. Relax, unwind and let us take care of bringing your coffee experience straight to you.

Expect more than coffee

Explore new cities and single-origin regions without packing a bag. Personalize your experience with a variety of machines and accessories that make each coffee moment uniquely yours.*

* Availability of features will depend upon your geographical area

Why clutter your phone with multiple store apps when Flipp can find you deals from them all? Flipp is your ultimate grocery savings and price matching tool. Simplify your shopping routine and save an average of $46 per week on food and more. Plan ahead with flyers, coupons, and your shopping list, all in one place!

Easily save money on grocery shopping and compare food prices from:
- Walmart Canada
- Real Canadian Superstore
- Save on Foods
- Freshco
- Safeway
- Food Basics
- Giant Tiger
- Fortinos

Flipp has something for everyone — from tech lovers to pet parents. Find deals from your favourite stores including:
- General Merchandise (Canadian Tire, Costco Canada)
- Pharmacy (Shoppers Drugmart, Rexall)
- Electronics (Best Buy, The Source)
- Pets (Pet Valu, Petsmart)
- Home & Garden (Home Depot, Home Hardware)
- Groceries (Sobeys, No Frills, Metro)

Love rewards? Flipp's loyalty card wallet is your answer! Manage Triangle Rewards, PC Optimum, Air Miles, and more in one place. Stay updated on new store flyers and start saving with Flipp today! Here’s how:

Find flyers and deals at nearby stores.
- Find deals from Walmart Canada, Save on Foods, Freshco, and more local stores.
- Bonus! Select your favourite stores to quickly access your go-to grocery flyers in one spot.

Search for any item to compare prices at different stores.
- Search for foods like “ground beef” or “eggs” to see which stores have them on sale.
- Search for any grocery store, like Sobeys, No Frills, Metro, or Fortinos and quickly find their flyer.

Save flyer deals and grocery coupons to your shopping list.
- “Clip” or circle deals from weekly flyers to your grocery list.
- Tap the plus (+) icon straight from search results to save a deal to your grocery list.

Create your digital shopping list.
- Add food or other items to your grocery list and Flipp will show you deals for the items on your list.
- Share and combine shopping lists with a friend so that you can both view and add items to it.

Collect loyalty points and rewards.
- Keep forgetting your Optimum card at home? Load your loyalty cards to Flipp and keep a digital wallet of all your go-to rewards from stores including Canadian Tire, Sobeys, Walmart Canada, and more.
- Never miss collecting rewards points at checkout. PC Optimum, Air Miles, Triangle Rewards, and more cards can be loaded to your Flipp app!

Make price matching simple.
- Price match at participating stores like Food Basics, No Frills, Real Canadian Superstore, Freshco, and Giant Tiger.
- Clip deals from local flyers to make price matching a breeze while saving on food.

Discover deals by store category.
- Save money on electronics from Best Buy, on pet supplies from Pet Valu and Petsmart, health essentials from Shoppers Drugmart and Rexall, and even groceries from Metro and Safeway.
- Shop home & garden sales from stores like Home Depot and Home Hardware.

Save money every week by comparing prices.
- Discover local Canadian stores that are new to you in the ‘Explore’ page. You might find a new favourite!
- From your shopping list, tap the arrow to compare prices for that item at different stores.

Get notified when deals drop.
- Don’t see a deal you love right now? Create a Watch List of items to track.
- Flipp will notify you when there are fresh deals for the items on your list.

Save time and money on groceries with Flipp! Get smart shopping lists, digital coupons, and weekly deals from thousands of stores like Giant Tiger, Costco Canada, Home Hardware, PetSmart, and more. Don’t miss out—download Flipp now!

Questions or suggestions? Contact us at https://help.flipp.com

Discover brand new skincare and beauty rituals with Sephora. Explore the best beauty products from the top beauty brands like FENTY BEAUTY by Rihanna, The Ordinary, and Dior.

Try the latest product releases or find your new favourite brands focusing on inclusivity and diversity. 

Treat yourself and redeem your points for Beauty Insider Cash or luxurious samples. Discover the best skincare products from moisturizers to cleansers, treatments, and much more!

Explore the extensive list of skincare products to perfect your skincare routine or find the latest makeup styles and looks. If you are looking for good beauty at a better price, try Sephora Collection makeup and skincare! Everything you could need is in one place.

3 Reasons you’ll love the Sephora app
1. Get access to offers & deals with Beauty Insider
2. Shop all your favourite beauty products in just a few steps
3. Discover the latest trends & releases

Interested in clean products with ingredients you’ll love? Look for the green “Clean at Sephora” seal which means the product is formulated without parabens, sulfates SLS and SLES, phthalates, mineral oils, formaldehyde, and more!

Easily shop for your must-have skincare product, perfect beauty staple or the latest makeup trend on the Sephora App.

Sephora Features:

SKINCARE
• Find the perfect skincare routine for your skin type
• Treat acne, dark spots, dryness & pores with our top-rated products
• Shop from leading skincare brands like Kiehl’s, La Mer, Drunk Elephant & many more!

MAKEUP & COSMETICS
• Best-selling brands like Urban Decay, KVD Vegan Beauty & many more!
• Browse palettes, mini sizes & value sets to suit your beauty budget
• Get special access to the latest offers

FRAGRANCE
• Buy all-time favourite fragrances or try a fresh new signature scent
• Select beautifully packaged gift sets & mini-editions
• Scents from Jean Paul Gaultier, Lancome, Yves Saint Laurent, and more

HAIR PRODUCTS
• Explore tools to style and treat your hair for effortlessly luscious locks
• Try out the very best conditioners & hair masks
• Shop beautifully packaged sets for the perfect hair care gift

The Sephora App has your beauty needs covered from head to toe. Never miss a beauty deal with Insider-only offers, products uniquely at Sephora, promotions and more.

Download now for the best beauty shopping experience!

Summary information concerning the data collected by the App can be found within the App Privacy section below. Note that the summary only applies to the App, not information collected by Sephora in other contexts, such as on our website. Also note that the summary is controlled by Apple using predefined terms and selections. A full explanation of our privacy practices can be found in our privacy policy at https://www.sephora.com/ca/en/beauty/privacy-policy. To the extent there may be a discrepancy between an App-specific privacy disclosure, and the Sephora Privacy Policy, you should look to the Sephora Privacy Policy for clarity.

developer: Hangzhou Alibaba International Information Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
What is Alibaba.com?
Alibaba.com is one of the world’s leading B2B ecommerce marketplaces. Our app allows you to source products from global suppliers, all from the convenience of your mobile device.

Purchase with confidence
Our Trade Assurance service protects your orders and payments on the platform, letting you purchase securely and conveniently with extended support.

Customizable products
Meet suppliers with years of customization and order fulfillment experience for sellers on Amazon, eBay, Wish, Etsy, Mercari, Lazada, and more.

Easy sourcing
Discover millions of ready-to-ship products in every industry category. Tell suppliers what you need and get quotes quickly with Request for Quotation services.

Fast shipping
Alibaba.com partners with major freight forwarders to provide land, sea, and air shipping solutions with on-time delivery services, end-to-end tracking, and competitive prices.

Livestreams and factory tours
Interact with manufacturers in real-time via product demos and tours of manufacturing facilities, providing insight and oversight on how your products are made.

Popular categories and trade shows
Source a wide range of popular items – from trending consumer goods to raw materials – and join our annual trade shows for niche product highlights and discounts.

Quality control
Choose Alibaba.com Production Monitoring and Inspection Services to reduce production delay and quality risks.

Discounts and promotions
Unlock new discounts and promotions from featured manufacturers and suppliers.

Stay updated
Use the Alibaba.com app to stay up to date on new products and promotions from your favorite suppliers.

Language and currency support
Alibaba.com supports 16 languages and 140 local currencies. Use our real-time translator to communicate with sellers in your mother tongue.

From computers and cameras to toys and video games, the Best Buy iOS app is packed with nearly a million products. Shop online and have things shipped to your door, or reserve products to pickup in-store. Plus, with My Best Buy benefits at your fingertips, pull up store and online purchase details anytime, anywhere.

Shop and browse online, anytime, anywhere

• Choose from nearly a million products ranging from laptops and TVs to furniture and baby gear
• See what’s available online and in-store and do your online shopping in the Best Buy app

Reserve online, pickup and pay in-store
• Reserve products in the app for in-store pickup at one of our 179 locations
• Pickup and pay for products within 24 hours of your reservation

Protect your products with Geek Squad
• Add Geek Squad Protection to your products for peace of mind

Easily access My Best Buy account benefits
• See store and online purchases in Order History
• Save your favourite products in one convenient place
• Checkout faster online and track orders easily
• Contact us about your order and start the return process
• Find out about the hottest deals with our notifications feature

Compare deals between Marketplace sellers
• Find the best online deals from Marketplace sellers

Scan products in-store for more info
• Get instant product info by scanning QR codes in-store
• Read product descriptions, see images, and read reviews

Find Best Buy stores near you
• Use the Best Buy store locator to find nearby stores
• See Best Buy store hours and get directions

Triangle Rewards is a loyalty program that rewards real life.
The Triangle App for iOS makes collecting and redeeming Canadian Tire Money® even more rewarding. 

Designed for New & Existing Customers
Triangle Rewards lets you earn and redeem Canadian Tire Money on just about everything across all of your favourite stores including Canadian Tire, Sport Chek, Mark’s, L’Équipeur, Party City, Atmosphere, Pro Hockey Life, Sports Rousseau, L’Entrepôt du Hockey, Hockey Experts and participating Sports Experts stores.

Personalized offers in your pocket
Get weekly personalized offers based on the things you need & love. Activate all your offers with just one tap and watch your CT Money roll in. 

Swap your offers for the things you want
Got a great offer this week but it’s just not right for you? Offer Swap let’s you trade it in for a Community Offer from another member. Now you can rack up the rewards even faster!

Save for something special with Goal Tracking
Whether its those stylish new runners or a new bed for your furry friend, this feature will help you stay on track. Pick something fun to save for, set an amount and watch your CT Money add up as you reach your goal. 

Managing your Credit Card
Manage your credit card accounts easily. Enrol in e-statements, view your transactions CT Money balance, account balances and statements directly in the app. Plus, you can schedule one-time or recurring bill payments to make things a little bit easier.

IMPORTANT DISCLOSURES AND CONSENT

To understand current and future consumer interests and to improve and develop new products, services, programs, promotions, contests or events, President's Choice Services Inc. may track and analyze your use of the application, including offers viewed, opt-out preferences, click-throughs and other use of features. We may collect personal information and non-personal information electronically, directly from you or through third parties. For instance, we may access personal information about you when you share information about yourself on social media networks and also when you interact with us electronically, such as through our information technology systems, websites, email, mobile applications, social media properties or online advertising. If you choose to download or use this application ("App"), we may receive personal information and non-personal information about your current location and about your mobile device, tablet, or such browser, such as unique identifier for your device. Most devices, tablets and browsers allow you to turn off the tracking of your location. However, if you do so, you may not be able to use some of the app features.
